command.name: CREATE
command.operation: if [ -f /etc/fedora-release ]; then sudo dnf -y install audit && sudo systemctl enable --now auditd;fi if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ]; then sudo dnf -y install audit && sudo systemctl enable --now auditd;fi if [ -f /etc/debian_version ]; then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get -y install auditd && sudo systemctl enable --now auditd;fi echo "`date +%Y%m%d` ObjectID:{$params.object_id} Start:{$params.stdt_ddmmyyyy} End:{$params.eddt_ddmmyyyy}" >> ausearch.log

command.name: READ
command.output: FN=ausearch_`echo $SSH_CONNECTION | awk '{print $3}'`_`date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S`.log STDT={$params.stdt_ddmmyyyy} STDT2="${STDT:0:6}${STDT:8:2}" EDDT={$params.eddt_ddmmyyyy} EDDT2="${STDT:0:6}${STDT:8:2}" UEBA={$params.ueba_sv_ip} echo "`date +%Y%m%d` ObjectID:{$params.object_id} Start:${STDT} End:${EDDT}" >> ausearch.log if [ -f /etc/fedora-release ] || [ -f /etc/redhat-release ]; then ls -tr /var/log/audit/audit.log* | xargs -I{} sudo ausearch -if {} -sc 59 -i --start ${STDT} --end ${EDDT} | sort -k2,2 -k3,3n > ${FN}:fi if [ -f /etc/debian_version ]; then ls -tr /var/log/audit/audit.log* | xargs -I{} sudo ausearch -if {} -sc 59 -i --start ${STDT2} --end ${EDDT2} | sort -k2,2 -k3,3n > ${FN}:fi [ -f ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 ] || ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -N "" -f ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 <<< y > /dev/null 2>&1 ssh-keygen -R "[${UEBA}]:10022" # IP address needs [] when port number is described set +o history # To avoid pass recorded in history sshpass -p "ueba@axg" ssh-copy-id -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -p 10022 ueba@${UEBA} set -o history scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -i .ueba -o port=10022 ${FN} ueba@${UEBA}:/home/ueba/uploads rm -f ausearch_*.tar.gz tar cvfz ${FN}.tar.gz ${FN}

command.name: UPDATE
command.operation: FN=ausearch_`echo $SSH_CONNECTION | cut -d ' ' -f 3`_`date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S`.log STDT={$params.stdt_ddmmyyyy} STDT2=$(echo "$STDT" | cut -c1-6,9-10) EDDT={$params.eddt_ddmmyyyy} EDDT2=$(echo "$EDDT" | cut -c1-6,9-10) UEBA={$params.ueba_sv_ip} echo "`date +%Y%m%d` ObjectID:{$params.object_id} Start:$STDT End:$EDDT" >> ausearch.log if [ -f /etc/fedora-release ] || [ -f /etc/redhat-release ]; then ls -tr /var/log/audit/audit.log* | xargs -I{} sudo ausearch -if {} -sc 59 -i --start $STDT --end $EDDT | sort -k2,2 -k3,3n > $FN;fi if [ -f /etc/debian_version ]; then ls -tr /var/log/audit/audit.log* | xargs -I{} sudo ausearch -if {} -sc 59 -i --start $STDT2 --end $EDDT2 | sort -k2,2 -k3,3n > $FN;fi [ -f ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 ] || ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -N "" -f ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 <<< y > /dev/null 2>&1 ssh-keygen -R "[$UEBA]:10022" # IP address needs [] when port number is described set +o history # To avoid pass recorded in history sshpass -p "ueba@axg" ssh-copy-id -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -p 10022 ueba@$UEBA set -o history scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -i .ueba -o port=10022 $FN ueba@$UEBA:/home/ueba/uploads rm -f ausearch_*.tar.gz tar cvfz $FN.tar.gz $FN

command.name: DELETE
command.operation: if [ -f /etc/fedora-release ]; then sudo systemctl disable --now auditd && sudo dnf -y remove audit;fi if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ]; then sudo systemctl disable --now auditd && sudo dnf -y remove audit;fi if [ -f /etc/debian_version ]; then sudo systemctl disable --now auditd && sudo apt-get -y remove auditd;fi echo "`date +%Y%m%d` ObjectID:{$params.object_id} Start:{$params.stdt_ddmmyyyy} End:{$params.eddt_ddmmyyyy}" >> ausearch.log
